verses.verse: (Prayer for Relief from Adversaries) To the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. (Ps. 38:title) To bring to remembrance. [1] Make haste, (Ps. 40:13-17) O God, to deliver me! Make haste to help me, O LORD!
(Ps. 35:4, 26) Let them be ashamed and confounded Who seek my life; Let them be turned back and confused Who desire my hurt.
(Ps. 40:15) Let them be turned back because of their shame, Who say, “Aha, aha!”
Let all those who seek You rejoice and be glad in You; And let those who love Your salvation say continually, “Let God be magnified!”
(Ps. 72:12, 13) But I am poor and needy; (Ps. 141:1) Make haste to me, O God! You are my help and my deliverer; O LORD, do not delay.
